Text:
proper ute...
: Stardust.2007.PROPER.CUSTOM.SWESUB.NTSC.DVDR-FAiRViEW
if ur smart u'll wait for it...

Så där nu har jag gjort mitt,
nu är det upp till er och fortsätta seeda.
Tack för mig så länge :)

får ikke pekket ut filer over 4GB. har du forslag hvordan jeg gjør det.
I have`nt been able to unpack files larger then 4GB. What should I do to unpack them. Do you have any ideas on what I should do or what is wrong?

For Semv:

You need to convert your filesystem to NTFS, FAT32 doesn't support files over 4 Gb, you should be able to do tjis if you are running Win XP, earlier versions of Windows (like Windows 98) doesn't support NTFS at all.
